articles.title: Multi-Stage ValleyRAT Targets Chinese Users with Advanced Tactics

articles.title: New Banshee Stealer Targets 100+ Browser Extensions on Apple macOS Systems

articles.title: SolarWinds Releases Patch for Critical Flaw in Web Help Desk Software

articles.title: Russian-Linked Hackers Target Eastern European NGOs and Media

articles.title: GitHub Vulnerability 'ArtiPACKED' Exposes Repositories to Potential Takeover

articles.title: Belarusian-Ukrainian Hacker Extradited to U.S. for Ransomware and Cybercrime Charges

articles.title: Researchers Uncover Vulnerabilities in Solarman and Deye Solar Systems

articles.title: Industrial Remote Access Tool Ewon Cosy+ Vulnerable to Root Access Attacks

articles.title: DOJ Charges Nashville Man for Helping North Koreans Get U.S. Tech Jobs

articles.description: The scheme, from the group also known as APT28, involves targeting Eastern European diplomats in need of personal transportation, tempting them with a purported good deal on a Audi Q7 Quattro SUV.
articles.title: Russia's 'Fighting Ursa' APT Uses Car Ads to Install HeadLace Malware
